mean_cn: n. 掷，掷钱币来决定，猛抬头；  v. 扔，抛，掷
mean_en: to throw something lightly or carelessly;  to move your head suddenly upwards, especially to show that you are annoyed or impatient; to move or make somebody/something move from side to side or up and down; to throw a coin in the air in order to decide something, especially by guessing which side is facing upwards when it lands
sentence: This coin toss will decide who goes first.
